text: Cesar Julio Romero Jr. (February 15, 1907 - January 1, 1994) was an American actor and activist. He was in movies, radio works, and television programs for almost sixty years. His roles included playing lovers, historical people in costume dramas, characters in light comedies, and the Joker in the Batman 1966 TV series. ==Life== Romero was born on February 15, 1907 in New York City. He was raised in Bradley Beach, New Jersey. He never married. He was a homosexual. Romero died on January 1, 1994 in Santa Monica, California from complications of a pulmonary embolism caused by bronchopneumonia. He was 86 years old. ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1907 births Category:1994 deaths Category:Actors from New Jersey Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:Actors who played the Joker Category:American movie actors Category:American radio actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Deaths from bronchopneumonia Category:Deaths from pulmonary embolism Category:Infectious disease deaths in California Category:LGBT actors Category:LGBT people from New Jersey Category:LGBT people from New York (state)
title: Cesar Romero
